Performs a differential item functioning analysis of polytomous items using ANCOVA

Performs a differential item functioning analysis of polytomous items using ANCOVA

Rasch analysis of polytomous items with the partial credit model
SchepersCluster()

Rasch analysis of dichotomous or polytomous items
best_items()
Fits all possible combinations of k items from a pool of n items to a single-factor model.
best_itemsPar()
Fits all possible combinations of k items from a pool of n items to a single-factor model using parallel processing.

Confirmatory factor analysis of ordinal items with WLSMV estimation

Detection of statistically significant differential item functioning via ANCOVA of standardized Rasch residuals
